snippet: Although the campaign is rooted in humor, the A.C.L.U. said its intent is to draw attention to a serious issue, marriage equality for gay couples.
abstract: Advertising column; American Civil Liberties Union will launch campaign to draw further attention to issue of marriage equality for gay couples; campaign is rooted in humor.
lead_paragraph: Although the campaign is rooted in humor, the A.C.L.U. said its intent is to draw attention to a serious issue, marriage equality for gay couples.

headline.main: Support, and a Smile, for Same-Sex Marriage
headline.print_headline: Support, and a Smile, For Same-Sex Marriage

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
